attributes.action: make powerful changes in policy in order to take a leading stand to bring the UK and Europe into a new era of sustainability
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government must take a leading stand by changing policy in order to set up a sustainable UK and help encourage a sustainable EU. These changes must be taken in order that the UK energy infrastructure will utilise its main natural renewable resources, mainly wind power, and to use the progression of renewable energy and sustainability in order to regenerate the economy.
